subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Red Wings defenseman Brett Lebda whisked a shot past Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur in the third period, lifting Detroit to its first victory at the Meadowlands since 1993.
snippet: Red Wings defenseman Brett Lebda whisked a shot past Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur in the third period, lifting Detroit to its first victory at the Meadowlands since 1993.
